entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
